website_summaries.verdict: If you want beautiful false lashes that aren't over-the-top but can be worn comfortably for almost any occasion, this is the pair to get.
pros: Comfortable on and easy to apply
Can be trimmed for custom length
cons: May be too long for some wearers

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I received my order and the first thing I noticed was that these are the "Wispies" and not the "Glamour" lashes which was in the description. Secondly, I ordered the #113 and yes, it does say #113 but it is a sticker that covers the #614. Nice try. I'm not too impressed by this company and will not be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J. Gregg

customer_reviews.title: My go to lashes! I wear these all the ...
customer_reviews.text: My go to lashes! I wear these all the time and people always asks me what lashes I wear. I wear them a little farther out to emphasize my go-to cat eye look.
customer_reviews.author: Shinel SpaldingTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: False description
customer_reviews.text: Description says a four pack , I received a one pack of lashes which is VERY unreasonable for the price paid . Now I have to go through the hassle of doing a return at UPS. No way I’m pay 10 dollars for some Ardell eyelashes which are about 4 dollars a pack .
customer_reviews.author: Joselune N.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little nervous after reading some reviews that said they weren’t sent the right lashes, but was happy to find the 113’s I always use when I opened the package.
customer_reviews.author: Chrysanthemomma

customer_reviews.title: Can’t be real! So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed I went through four pairs for one time because the lashes would randomly be misshapen, or the lash would just pluck right off, from all the hype these lashes have in the beauty world I truelly don’t think these are true ardell lashes because they were the worst lashes I’d had ever purchased. The boxes have different length lashes they were so long I had to cut them but even that didn’t save them. They should match and not be so cheap and fragile. I’ll just go get them from ulta so I don’t waste the money taking amazon risks.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Makes the eyes pop!!
customer_reviews.text: Ardell is my favorite brand of lashes. I keep a couple pairs stocked in the makeup bag at all times. The 113's are a great size! they are definitely more of a glamour look, but not too over the top. I wear to most girls outings, social events, and even special dinners. Why not they are fun and make your eyes pop in photos. Easy to apply. Do not come with glue.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy S. Pile

customer_reviews.title: These are the best lashes I have come by
customer_reviews.text: These are the best lashes I have come by. They look good all day long and I have even used them twice. They look glamorous without looking super fake. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Kortney H.

customer_reviews.title: Won't Purchase Again
customer_reviews.text: These are one time use at best. Tried wearing twice but they had lost their shape and the lashes were off. Hard to explain but definitely will not order again. The one plus is they are very lightweight and you can forget you're wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: sqnzcjc

customer_reviews.title: The lashes themselves are great but I only received 1 pair (I purchased 4)
customer_reviews.text: The lashes themselves are great but I only received 1 pair (I purchased 4)... I would like a refund or a a new 4 pack of lashes if possible, thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Vannah

customer_reviews.title: Gift for wife at her request.
customer_reviews.text: She's been using these for decades and love them. Your tastes may vary. These are big/long lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Bob G of Troy

customer_reviews.title: It says pack of 4, only received one pack
customer_reviews.text: The item says pack of 4. When i opened the package it was only one pair of eyelashes. I like the lashes, i just got ripped off since they didn’t put the other 3 in there
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm so in love with these lashes, my only issue is because they are factory made some batchs can look slightly different. Some look very straight cut at the ends were another batch could be perfect wispy at the ends like the photo provided. Either way they are great, but getting the one's that look like the photo are always the best!!!! If they can get that right consistently then that would be perfect. Seller is great and fast. I recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Cole F.

customer_reviews.title: ... difference with my false lashes and 113 is my favorite.. I knew right away these weren't them
customer_reviews.text: Since I know the difference with my false lashes and 113 is my favorite.. I knew right away these weren't them. I don't know if they ran out or what. But to put a sticker over the wrong lashes is really bad business. I have never had a problem with Amazon before, and this has made me lose some trust. If you want Wispies then you will like these. It's Wispies 614 NOT 113!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lashes, but misleading
customer_reviews.text: I always order these lashes because they are very natural looking and still glamorous. However, the past few times I’ve ordered this set, I’ve only gotten one pair when it’s supposed to be a pack of 4.
customer_reviews.author: Katie D.

customer_reviews.title: I like these lashes
customer_reviews.text: I like these lashes. Really pretty and blends well with my natual lashes. I just attach these and blend in with my natural lashes without mascara so it doesn't look so fake during daytime and works out great. Couple of lashes came out during cleanup but it could be my fault to pull too hard to remove glue residue. Overall I like the shape, length
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Only received one pair 👎🏼
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointing!!! Don’t bother ordering! It clearly says you’re buying a pack of 4 pairs of lashes. I only received 1 pair. This is a really poor deal for the money I paid!
customer_reviews.author: E ATT

customer_reviews.title: Great lashes
customer_reviews.text: Theses are a little longer than the Demi wispiness but the go on nicely and are prettier. Very nice lashes. I love Ardell
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The longer the lash the better
customer_reviews.text: These lashes are great and inexpensive. I usually curl mine which creates a longer lash look to them, so these are my go to when I don’t want to spend a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not 113 Glamour
customer_reviews.text: While these ones are decent, they are not what I ordered. There is a difference in length between the 113 wispies and the 113 glamour which I thought I had ordered from the picture I seen in my order. Ughhh... lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as pictured...
customer_reviews.text: I received the 113 in the from the Wispie collection and I was annoyed bc they don't fit the same as I remember the Glamour ones fitting and the lashes don't match up from one pair to another, like drastically different. On the eye is looks similar to the Glamour collection but I will not purchase from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Danniella Carter

customer_reviews.title: Was suppose to be a pack of 4 & only received 1.
customer_reviews.text: I love these lashes, but it states it's suppose to be a pack of 4 but only received 1. WTH!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, lightweight lashes
customer_reviews.text: Nice, lightweight lashes. Even though they are long and fluttery, on me, they are more of a natural style lash rather than a full glam type lash. I love them for casual or everyday wear. I actually like the light strip vs the thick heavy strips but they unfortunately don't last as long. Worth buying though.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Love the length on these
customer_reviews.text: Love the length on these! Quite a bit longer than the normal Ardell lashes I buy at the drugstore, but in a great way!
customer_reviews.author: Mikkel

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: These are my go to eyelashes I order on a continual basis. I can reuse them up to about 5-7 times if I gently pull them off my eyes, rather than rinse them off to loosen up the glue. That way, no water touches them before I wash my face which will insure the look stays new.
customer_reviews.author: ASmith1125

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Lashes
customer_reviews.text: Fast Shipping. Couldn’t pass up a great deal. These are wonderful beginner lashes! If you’re ever indecisive about what lashes to get wispies will always have your back.
customer_reviews.author: Nady_Lo

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The description says that its a four pack but I only received one pair of lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Alayna

customer_reviews.title: Good for costume looks,  not so much for every day
customer_reviews.text: 113's are more dramatic than some other lashes I've used and I would only put them on for certain occasions or Halloween looks. These tend to make my eyes appear less open than other styles I've used and for me they are more noticeably artificial. Ardell 122's work better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love
customer_reviews.text: I'm an eyelash newbie and these are both light weight and natural looking.
customer_reviews.author: CoCo Caye

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed! Was suppose to be a pack of four ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! Was suppose to be a pack of four and it was only one. Description is very misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Janell Matos

customer_reviews.title: Wrong lashes
customer_reviews.text: When I received the lashes I got a different pair, not the 113 ones listed and pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Order was incomplete. Received only one set of Lashes.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I only received one set of lashes when I ordered 4. My order was incomplete by 75%, and it’s a hassle to have to send one pair back in hopes of possibly getting a set of 4 in return
customer_reviews.author: Alex Beswerchij

customer_reviews.title: these are amazing
customer_reviews.text: they are so easy to put on and they are great for going out! they look like real lashes ( if you apply them correctly) and they arent too gaudy. I like big lashes that look a little like they are fake, and these are questionable to people. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not the wispy lashes pictured. Even more disappointed that I cannot return them for the pictured item.
customer_reviews.author: ImMrsWeaver

customer_reviews.title: Thiese are my favorite and always my go to
customer_reviews.text: Thiese are my favorite and always my go to. I constantly get complements on them. For a dramatic look definitely pick these.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Day or evening ware lashes
customer_reviews.text: Wore them for work. I work in a professional office setting.... I got a lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Maria D Ocañas

customer_reviews.title: Beware of picture, it's deceiving.
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered these because these are the style I normally get them in and I thought they were going to be wispy like I normally get them but they weren't. So the product they sent me isn't the product that's shown. They're not horrible but I feel like they're longer and faker-looking than I'm used to. It's ok now because I added mascara and they look a little more natural but kind of disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - FAKE
customer_reviews.text: These lashes are complete garbage and falsely labeled. DO NOT BUY!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Demi Schlehofer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love.
customer_reviews.text: I personally wear false eyelashes all the time. I don't leave the house with out them. These eyelashes are great. I personally love the dramatic look and these are perfect for them. I like to double up my eyelashes. So I just put one eyelash on top of the other. I love them. I will def repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: it said pack of 4 but i only received one??? don't buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've ordered these before and it was fine, they're okay lashes
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered these before and it was fine, they're okay lashes. I liked them so I wanted to use them again. My order somehow got messed up, though and I was only sent one pair. I have been trying to get it fixed but no luck yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong style
customer_reviews.text: I like the the ardell wispies too but I was aiming to the glamour wispies
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SCAM! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Total scam. Advertised 4 packs of lashes and only received 1 pack. And they were not even the glamour lashes advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Elyse

customer_reviews.title: Not Wispies
customer_reviews.text: These are not Wispies. Switched? They don't match the picture. I can't use them if they've been tampered with. My second picture shows real wispies which I found at a Target. Nothing close.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading, Odered 2 - 4 packs only received 2 pairs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product, the description clearly states this comes in a pack of 4 pairs. I ordered 2 packs and only received 2 pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Reginal Brown

customer_reviews.title: To dramatic for my small almond eye shape. I ...
customer_reviews.text: To dramatic for my small almond eye shape. I gave them away.
customer_reviews.author: Jonespartyof5

customer_reviews.title: Great lashes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a bodybuilding competition I did - they were PERFECT. They were easy to apply, although they didn't come with glue. I already had some DUO glue, though, so it wasn't a huge issue. Loved these!
customer_reviews.author: T.W.

customer_reviews.title: Natural Yet Bold!
customer_reviews.text: These lashes are gorgeous!!! They are long and luscious, yet they look natural at the same time. With mascara, they blend into my lashes perfectly. I will definitely be ordering more and perhaps trying other lashes by Ardell.
customer_reviews.author: Eden

customer_reviews.title: Great lashes!
customer_reviews.text: The best lashes you can buy! I love #113 the most out of all Ardell lashes I've purchased. Looks natural yet dramatic.
customer_reviews.author: ILoveMusic

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my sisters birthday and she enjoys the eyelashes.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey’s Used Books

customer_reviews.title: I got 4 packs of the wrong lashes and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I got 4 packs of the wrong lashes and I a read in the reviews someone did to but I trust I would get the right thing
customer_reviews.author: Reina

customer_reviews.title: Not sold as advertised, but pretty lashes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these lashes because they were a good deal- 4 pack of lashes for under $11. But when they arrived, it was only one pair just tossed in the box with other items I ordered. It wasn't even in a plastic baggie. I'm so disappointed, because I really do like these lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good but I only received one pair. It says PACK OF 4!
customer_reviews.author: Giselle Velez

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It's says 4 packs (or 4 pairs), but I only got one (!) pair/pack. Why lying to the customers?
customer_reviews.author: Valeria S

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only brand I wear!!! Absolutely love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Clark

customer_reviews.title: Demi Wispies Are Better!
customer_reviews.text: I do like these lashes, but they are a little too much for me (too long). They may be appropriate for a wedding or some other super special occasion, but not for just going out on a weekend nor everyday use. I bought these (113) and a pack of Demi Wispies. The Demi Wispies lashes are far more natural-looking and just make your eyes strikingly beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: ACHA

customer_reviews.title: I am amazed at the speed this item was delivered and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at the speed this item was delivered and the great quality and the way of packing was great ..
customer_reviews.author: Memi_al

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This package only came with 2 pairs of lashes not 4 pairs
customer_reviews.author: tara

customer_reviews.title: Full-On-Glam
customer_reviews.text: I love these lashes, they are very long and glamorous. I can use one pair up to 10 times. They are great.
customer_reviews.author: Briana André

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Look
customer_reviews.text: Love these lashes they are light weight and are easy to apply. I wear them everyday and I get many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Detri J Williams

customer_reviews.title: Lash-errific!!
customer_reviews.text: Best lashes Evah!!! My daughter orders them on my Amazon account. But I never give them to her. I stick them on everything!!! Made myself fancy eyebrows once. Stuck one on my plate at a restaurant and had my meal comped. But them on the dog's snout. Said he was German. Love them. Order them for your Dad!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: and the lashes are beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Much cheaper than other stores, and the lashes are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo W

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!
customer_reviews.text: Love these lashes they are super natural looking and give a good length. Super light weight and easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Juan hidalgo

customer_reviews.title: They sent the wrong ones :(
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive the glamour, recieved wispies instead, not happy with that but the lashes are extremely beautiful !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Opinion about this product.
customer_reviews.text: EXACTLY WHAT YOU FIND IN A STORE! -extremely long and good price for 4 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Chavez

customer_reviews.title: They are ok
customer_reviews.text: I like them but they are a little to long and full for me. I like to enhance my real lashes but not have them scream out that I'm wearing fake eyelashes.
customer_reviews.author: A. Douthit

customer_reviews.title: Ardell has the best lashes
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of fake eyelashes and wear them regularly. I've found that Ardell lashes are the most natural looking. I have them in different lengths and thicknesses. Get the Ardell waterproof glue to hold these suckers in place and you're good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M.

customer_reviews.title: I love these lashes there so natural light weights and a ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these lashes there so natural light weights and a very thin strip wouldn't which makes it very easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I just reseve only 1 pack of lash 113 not 4 pack
customer_reviews.author: noura

customer_reviews.title: I only recieved 3 of the actual pair and than ...
customer_reviews.text: I only recieved 3 of the actual pair and than the 4th one was in the 113 package but completely different lashes!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Ardell 113 are my absolute favorite false lashes
customer_reviews.text: Not the lashes shown!! Ardell 113 are my absolute favorite false lashes, and these are not them! They are not whispey and they do not cross over like the picture shows, or like the other pais of 113 i have purchased from other places. The lashes i recieved were much faker looking and too uniform, would be good for cheer or dance competition makeup, not everyday use. IF YOU WANT THE REAL ARDELL 113, DO NOT BUY THESE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fake lashes
customer_reviews.text: These lashes are very pretty. They are not easy to get in & have been slightly uncomfortable while wearing them. The lashes are lightweight & I do love how they make my eyes pop: this brand is much better than others I tried in the past
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Exactly Glamourous
customer_reviews.text: A year ago I ordered these and received exactly as pictured (loved them, tons of compliments). I reordered and received Wispies 113. Not the same. So I returned and re-ordered and received another round of Wispies. Bring back the Glamour! Take your chances here...
customer_reviews.author: SabaBa Mama

customer_reviews.title: Paid for 4. Only received 1.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a package of 4. Only received 1 pair. I would NEVER pay $10 for a single pair of lashes. What a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Not it -_-
customer_reviews.text: Not the same as the pic -_- i know what 113 look like I wear them all the time and there getting harder and harder to find ! What I received are not it !!! Very upset
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Wish they were better.
customer_reviews.text: These are way too long, I've tried trimming them and they end up looking weird. I just really can't pull of lashes that hit my eyebrows. Further, they peel up at the edges. I got a pack of 4 and they all do this. I'm really sad.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite lashes!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon is the best! Somehow I only received 1 pair instead of 4 and so I emailed them and they sent me a refund. The style of these lashes are cute. I wear lashes every day. Usually the Wispies or the Demi Wispies. These were a great cross between the two. My new favorite lashes!
customer_reviews.author: Aryn

customer_reviews.title: Do not order
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 4 pair of lashes and only received one pair of lashes!
customer_reviews.author: H. Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Need a refund.
customer_reviews.text: I only got one pair. This is such a rip off. Paid 12$ for one pair of Ardell lashes.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite drugstore brand eyelashes. Unfortunately they're so hard to find. The price is great. Every time I've ordered I've always received 4 pairs. Definitely will be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. I've used ardell 118 also but I think these look more natural. I watched a few YouTube tutorials to learn how to use fake lashes and it helped a TON.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite lashes so natural but long and awesome
customer_reviews.author: bianca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My favorite pair of eyelashes. Can be worn with natural or heavier makeup. Works well with each.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Warren

customer_reviews.title: Some people said that they only recieved two two packs ...
customer_reviews.text: Some people said that they only recieved two two packs which consists of 4 eyelashes. I recieved all 4 packs. Consisting of 8 eyelashes. Haven't tried them on. But they seem legit.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Lashes
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Found these as a reference from one of my favorite youtube beauty gurus and I am in LOVE! So gorgeous and as the photos shows. I am very happy
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Very Natural and not over the top.
customer_reviews.text: I truly love these eyelashes, although I need to cut the ends off them, they fit my eyes perfectly. The elastic band bends quite nicely and form fits to anyone's eye! They look very natural, so if you are thinking of getting these for a dramatic look, i'd try something else.
customer_reviews.author: M B

customer_reviews.title: Best eye lashes ever
customer_reviews.text: If it wasn't for the heat where I live, I would wear this babies all the time, they are comfortable and they look natural. I love that they are not heavy unlike other lashes that I have tried before. :-) and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: not the eyelashes I ordered. only 1 pair was the correct style, very dissappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I love Ardell lashes, but these 113's didn't look good at all... go for the Ardell Glamour 102's :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh..
customer_reviews.text: I got 4 sets of Wispies in 113 instead of the Glamour set I wanted. However, I still like the lashes it's just not what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would order again
customer_reviews.text: They were easy to use and reuse. They fit my eyes just right. They are easy to shape with an eyelash curler. Shipping was fast and I would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lashes, but they're a little too long for ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lashes, but they're a little too long for me and not that very natural looking. If your going for a long semi-dramatic look then these are for you
customer_reviews.author: Zena

customer_reviews.title: Ardell is the best!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing lashes that I'm able to reuse and they never loose their shape. These are awesome and they work for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Jesena Perez

customer_reviews.title: FAVORITE LASHES
customer_reviews.text: The Ardell 113 are my favoite ride or die lash. They are super long! Think of the Ardell Demi Wispies but a lot longer in length.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Flores

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: My favorite lashes. The price is right! I have ordered again and again. I also get about 2-3 wears out if each just stick back in the case when your done and their perfect to re-wear.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Night or Day wear
customer_reviews.text: really enjoy the feel of these they fit better than the cheaper lashes and last longer too! I get compliments on them all the time. I highly recommend these for night or day wear.
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorites of the Ardell Lashes
customer_reviews.text: They look natural but at the same time give your eyes more pop! Love them! Make sure you know how to put them on!
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: OH my gosh I absolutely love these and such a good price for a 4 pack!
customer_reviews.author: hayleymeagano

customer_reviews.title: Only Recieved One Pair of Lashes.
customer_reviews.text: I only received ONE pair, not the FOUR pair I ordered and paid for. These were not the GLAMOUR eyelashes, but another type/
customer_reviews.author: Joe_buyer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only brand of falsies I use, because they are affordable (in store, but even more so on Amazon) and they don't look ridiculously fake and stay on well! I do not feel bad only wearing them once and throwing me away because they are affordable enough to not have to try to save for the next use. They say they can be worn up to 3-4 times, but really, how germ free and healthy is that? Thank you for making these, I will continue to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Murata

customer_reviews.title: Crazy long!
customer_reviews.text: Waaaaay too long and "glamorous" for me but if you like long fakey looking lashes this is for you!
customer_reviews.author: C. Boyce

product_meta.title: Ardell Fashion Lashes Pair - 113 (Pack of 4)
product_meta.description: 100% Human Hair Easy to apply Comfortable to wear Stay secure until you take them off May be re-used up to three weeks
feature_bullets: Stay secure until you take them off
May be re-used up to three weeks
